Up to now, at least eight

functional forces forcing the evacuation of hundreds of

many vehicles carrying
Durian were escorted out of the warehouse by soldiers and police.
The government also announced the
closure of schools in the capital and
called on workers to stay home. The
cause of the fire has not yet been determined,
and the authorities will conduct an
investigation into the recent Viet Den incident.
